channel.title: Comments on: Church Planting is For Wimps 8: Redefine Extraordinary

item.title: By: John Divito
item.dc:creator: John Divito
item.description:
Dean,
You make a great connection with Trueman. I always enjoy reading him.
And I'll definitely be checking out the Hansen book. Thank you for the suggestion!
item.content:encoded:
Dean,

You make a great connection with Trueman. I always enjoy reading him.

And I’ll definitely be checking out the Hansen book. Thank you for the suggestion!

item.title: By: Dean Thornquist
item.dc:creator: Dean Thornquist
item.description:
Thank you, John:
The conclusion of this book collaborates well with the recent post “Carl Trueman on pastoral ministry”.
I would also recommend as an excellent companion for any pastor, planter, etc. The Art of Pastoring: Ministry Without All The Answers by David Hansen.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you, John:

The conclusion of this book collaborates well with the recent post “Carl Trueman on pastoral ministry”.

I would also recommend as an excellent companion for any pastor, planter, etc. The Art of Pastoring: Ministry Without All The Answers by David Hansen.
